title: Video game consumer market value worldwide 2011 - 2021 , by distribution
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting DLC market, and Package market. The y axis indicates the Value in billion USD and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall DLC market is gradually increasing, Package market is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Value in billion USD in descending order is: 1. Package market, and lastly, 2. DLC market.
Throughout the period, Package market generally had the highest Value in billion USD relative to others with an average of 20.05, and it reached its maximum at 2020 with a value of 87.0.
The botommost line, DLC market,  has a mean of 14.17, and peaked at 2021.
min_summary: This is a multi-line chart with 2 lines representing DLC market, and Package market. The y axis denotes Value in billion USD and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall DLC market is gradually increasing, Package market is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, Package market mostly maintained the highest Value in billion USD when compared to others with a mean value of 20.05, and it peaked at 2020.
DLC market mostly had the least Value in billion USD with a mean value of 14.17, which peaked at 2021 with a value of 28.9.
mid_summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting DLC market, and Package market. The y axis indicates the Value in billion USD and the x axis indicates Year.

max_summary: This is a multi-line chart with 2 lines representing DLC market, and Package market. The y axis denotes Value in billion USD and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall DLC market is gradually increasing, Package market is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Package market, and lastly, 2. DLC market.
Throughout the period, Package market generally had the highest Value in billion USD relative to others with an average of 20.05, and it reached its maximum at 2020 with a value of 87.0.
DLC market mostly had the least Value in billion USD with a mean value of 14.17, which peaked at 2021 with a value of 28.9.
DLC market reported the lowest Value in billion USD about 5.3 in Year 2011
The greatest difference of Value in billion USD between DLC market and Package market occurs at Year 2020 and the smallest difference occurs at 2016.
